details.sectionContent: Use the power of hydraulics and skill to construct a bridge.

You have to construct a bascule bridge based on Hydraulic mechanism. Materials like Popsicle sticks, fevicol, pins, syringe, ryles pipe, etc. Will be provided to construct a bridge with Hydraulic mechanism. The dimensions would be given according to that participants have to design the bridge. The bridge should also resist against varying load.

Participants have to construct Bascule Bridge which works on Hydraulic mechanism. A model will be shown at the beginning of the event. According to it they have to construct a bascule bridge of specified dimensions. Participants have to apply Hydraulic mechanism to the bridge.
The judging criteria will be based on:
鈐Depending on working of Hydraulic mechanism.
‣	As per height of bridge and length of deck.
‣	Varying load test.
